name: Agroinsider Lda
goal: Smart Agro-Processes by means of Remote Sensing, specially Sentinel 1 and 2. Monitoring globally and acting locally.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Current CAP (Article 40a in Implementing Regulation (EU) No. 809/2014)
